mapper.select: select *,group_concat(user_doctor_medical) as medicals from hospital_doctor where hospital_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select *,group_concat(user_doctor_medical) as medicals, group_concat(user_name) as names, group_concat(user_doctor_career) as careers, group_concat(user_doctor_graduate) as graduates, group_concat(user_image) as images, group_concat(user_doctor_code) as codes from hospital_doctor where hospital_name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or hospital_addr like concat('%',#{name},'%') or user_doctor_medical like concat('%',#{name},'%') group by hospital_code
select truncate(avg(review_score),1) from review where review_hospital_code=#{hospitalCode};

select ru.* from (select r.*, u.*, substring(u.user_register_number,8,1) as gender from reservation as r left outer join users as u on r.reservation_user_id=u.user_id) as ru where reservation_hospital_code=#{hospital_code}

select ru.reservation_time, ru.reservation_accept ,count(*) as count from (select r.*, u.*, substring(u.user_register_number,8,1) as gender from reservation as r left outer join users as u on r.reservation_user_id=u.user_id) as ru where ru.reservation_hospital_code=#{hospital_code} group by ru.reservation_time, ru.reservation_accept order by ru.reservation_time asc
